dialogue.text: You know, dinners used to be so much simpler when you and your sibling were kids. Just a bit of laughter and food - no heavy discussions. I miss that sometimes.
Your father has been watching those news reports again. He gets very opinionated about these things. I just hope dinner goes smoothly tonight.
I know you want to speak your mind, and I admire that. Justâ€¦ maybe try not to let things get too heated?
